title: Animations
description: Bring interactivity to your UI by smoothly transitioning properties and creating keyframe-driven animations.

lessons.title: Transitions
lessons.description: Learn how to apply <kbd>transition</kbd> to properties for smooth changes on state changes.
lessons.task: Add <kbd>transition: background-color 0.3s</kbd> to <kbd>.btn</kbd> so the color fades smoothly on hover.
lessons.previewBaseCSS: body { font-family: sans-serif; padding: 1rem; } .btn { background: black; color: white; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; border: none; cursor: pointer; } .btn:hover { background: white; color: black; }

lessons.title: Timing Funcs
lessons.description: Explore easing functions like <kbd>ease</kbd>, <kbd>linear</kbd>, <kbd>ease-in</kbd>, <kbd>ease-out</kbd> to control animation pacing.
lessons.previewBaseCSS: body { font-family: sans-serif; padding: 1rem; } .btn { background: navy; color: gold; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; border: none; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.5s; } .btn:hover { background: gold; color: navy; transform: scale(1.1); }

lessons.title: Keyframes
lessons.description: Create named animations using <kbd>@keyframes</kbd> and apply them via the <kbd>animation</kbd> shorthand.
lessons.task: Define a keyframe at <kbd>50%</kbd> with <kbd>transform: translateY(-20px)</kbd> and apply <kbd>animation: bounce 1s infinite</kbd> to <kbd>.ball</kbd>.
lessons.previewBaseCSS: body { font-family: sans-serif; padding: 1rem; } .ball { width: 50px; height: 50px; background: crimson; border-radius: 50%; margin: 2rem auto; }

lessons.title: Anim Properties
lessons.task: Apply the <kbd>pulse</kbd> animation to <kbd>.box</kbd> with <kbd>animation-name: pulse</kbd>, <kbd>animation-duration: 2s</kbd>, <kbd>animation-delay: 1s</kbd>, <kbd>animation-iteration-count: 2</kbd>, and <kbd>animation-fill-mode: forwards</kbd>.
lessons.previewBaseCSS: body { font-family: sans-serif; padding: 1rem; } .box { width: 100px; height: 100px; background: black; color: white; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; margin: 2rem auto; } @keyframes pulse { 0% { background: black; color: white; transform: scale(1); } 50% { background: white; color: black; transform: scale(1.2); } 100% { background: limegreen; color: black; transform: scale(1); } }
